sys_script_client.description: CreditCardHolderLookupOnChange sets the 'cc_holder_name'field to the value of the first_name and last_name of the record selected in the User record, by the option selected in the Credit Card Holder Lookup. If the 'cc_holder_name' is not a null string, it is not set to the value of the lookup.
sys_script_client.name: CreditCardHolderLookupOnChange
